titleStmt.title: The converted Presbyterian, or, The Church of England justified in a serious discourse between George, a devout English Protestant, and Andrew, a zealous Scotch Presbyterian, touching some practices in the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlayne, Edward, 1616-1703.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Chamberlayne. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
